name: Don't Loose Your Head
description:
Inspired by games like Metal Slug, this bullet-hell brings the player to a spaceship, where there are lots of aliens to be killed and tasks to be done. Made in 4 days during the Global Game Jam 2021.

How to play: 

Run around your spacecraft shooting 10 waves of aliens down, while paying attention to the tasks pointed by the moving arrows. Each task must be done bofore a certain amout of time or you will be doomed! If your life reaches zero, don't worry, you just need to find your head to go back to full HP.

Controls:

  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left Mouse Button - Hold it to shoot!
  • R Key - Reload your gun
  • E  Key - Hold it to complete tasks

Install instructions: 

Download the Executable.zip file, extract it, and click on Dont Lose Your Head.exe to play!

Credits:

  • Programming:  renanruan#3958
  •  Art:  @NHAAAAAAA#2704
  • Music & SFX:  @Paz#4778

Thanks for playing! Please let us know your thoughts on the game by commenting below!
